====
vote
====


Supported platforms
===================

* Python 3.4
* Windows


Installlation
=============

To install via pip:
 `> pip install vote`


Usage
=====

To vote on a reddit image poll:
 `> vote reddit_image_poll -i <reddit post id>`


Download
========

* PyPI: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/vote
* Source: https://github.com/amol9/vote
